channel.title: Radio on less on sec
channel.description: Recent content in Radio on less on sec

item.title: Walkthrough: BLE CTF
item.description: This CTF has been in my todo list for a good while, finally I had the time to solve it and to publish a walkthrough article on it! The challenge is available at: https://github.

item.title: Analysis of a Remote Control
item.description: A couple of days ago I found some old remote controls around the house and decided it was time to take out my old RTL-SDR and put it to good use.

item.title: Cloning RFID tags for fun and profit
item.description: RFID tags are a technology commonly used but not limited to industrial purposes. These systems are in fact used every day as public transport passes, as security token in access control systems or as a digital “bar code” in shops.
